ingredients.item: 250g pack essential Waitrose British Beef Steak Stir Fry or 250g sirloin steak, thinly sliced
Jim Kai Sweet Chilli & Pineapple Sauce
1 small red chilli, deseeded and thinly sliced
2 x 150g pack Amoy Straight To Wok Udon Thick Noodles

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Mix the steak with the chilli and pineapple sauce. Drop into the pan together with the sliced chilli and fry for 2 minutes.
Add the stock, noodles, white parts of the pak choi and soy sauce. Bring to the boil and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Add the remaining pak choi and leave until just wilted before serving.
